metadata.name: Pixel Knight #2
metadata.description: Pixel Knight Adventures is aNFT project based on a pixel-based game. Players can collect, trade, and battle with their Pixel Knight NFTs. Players can customize their own Pixel Knight with accessories and gear to make it unique. They can also join tournaments and participate in battles to win rewards. The game will also have a leaderboard system, where players can compete with each other to gain higher ranks and rewards.
